feed.title: Track Awesome Webaudio Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome WebAudio packages and resources.

entry.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Jun 23 - Jun 29, 2025
entry.content:
Packages / Libraries

  • dsssp (⭐28) - React component library for visualizing and managing audio filters with drag-n-drop and transitions support.

Packages / Apps

  • dsssp-demo (⭐5) - WebAudio music player with 7-bands EQ and filter presets.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jun 23 - Jun 29, 2025

entry.content:

entry.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Jun 29 - Jul 05, 2020
entry.content:
Packages / Libraries

  • @magenta/music (⭐2.1k) - A JavaScript library to use machine learning models and generate music in the browser, by having some neat abstractions over the Webaudio API.
  • soundfont-player - A soundfont loader/player to play MIDI sounds using WebAudio API.

Packages / Apps

  • Web Audio Metronome (⭐602) - metronome app that uses the Web Audio scheduler and setTimeout scheduler
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Jun 29 - Jul 05, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Jun 22 - Jun 28, 2020
entry.content:
Packages / Frameworks

  • Omnitone (⭐881) - Ambisonic spatial audio on the web.
  • Mach1Spatial (⭐64) - Vector based panning spatial audio on the web.

Packages / Libraries

  • XSound.js - Full stack library.
  • p5.sound - An extension that adds Web Audio functionality to the creative coding library p5.js.

Packages / Apps

  • X Sound - Multi Sound Application that uses XSound.js.

Resources / Books

  • JavaScript for Sound Artists - A bottom up JavaScript / DOM course using Web Audio for all the examples.
entry.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Jun 22 - Jun 28, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Jun 08 - Jun 14, 2020
entry.content:
Packages / Apps

  • AudioMass - free, open source, web-based Audio and Waveform Editor.
  • Csound IDE - web IDE for CSound programming language.
  • jamhub (⭐34) - low-latency remote music collaboration & jam.

Obsolete / Community

  • Web Audio Modules - synthesizers and audio effects processors for web browsers (both API and implementations).
entry.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Jun 08 - Jun 14, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Dec 09 - Dec 15, 2019
entry.content:
Packages / Frameworks

  • Bap (⭐116) - A toolkit for making beats and composing sequences, inspired by the classic MPC60/2000.

Packages / Libraries

  • Sound.js (⭐313) - A micro-library to load, play and generate sound effects and music for games and interactive applications.
  • Circular Audio Wave (⭐270) - A JS library for audio visualization in circular wave using Web Audio API and ECharts.
  • Wad (⭐1.9k) - Web Audio DAW. Use the Web Audio API for dynamic sound synthesis. It's like jQuery for your ears.

Resources / Tutorials

  • WebAudio School (⭐415) - A series of self-guided workshops to learn WebAudio.

Obsolete / Community

  • Gibberish (⭐394) - A JavaScript DSP library that creates JIT optimized audio callbacks using code generation techniques.
  • lissajous (⭐406) - A tool for programmatic audio performance.
  • SSSynthesiser.js (⭐50) - A wavetable synthesizer for interactive music and sound effects.
  • WAAX (⭐303) - Build Music Apps for browsers.
  • Band.js (⭐1.2k) An interface for the Web Audio API that supports rhythms, multiple instruments, repeating sections, and complex time signatures.
  • reverbGen (⭐59) - A JavaScript library for generating artificial reverb impulse responses.
  • TuneJS (⭐175) - A tuning library of microtonal and just intonation scales. Supports over 3,000 historical tunings.
  • Beet.js (⭐113) - A sequencer library for creating euclidean rhythms and polyrhythms.
  • AudioKeys (⭐239) - A QWERTY keyboard for web audio projects.
  • web-audio-test-api (⭐67) - A Web Audio test library for CI.
  • javascript-karplus-strong (⭐291) - JavaScript/Web Audio implementation of Karplus-Strong guitar synthesis.
  • osc-msg (⭐17) - OSC message decoder/encoder with fault tolerance.
  • Pizzicato (⭐1.7k) - A library that aims to simplify the creation and manipulation sounds in the browser.
  • Mooog (⭐29) - Tools that simplify working with AudioNodes, inspired by jQuery and mixing tables.
  • envelope-generator (⭐34) - Simple ADSR envelope generator for web audio.
  • audio contour (⭐20) - A 5 stage audio envelope generator.
  • web-audio-recorder-js (⭐788) - A library that records audio input (Web Audio API AudioNode object) and encodes to audio file image (Blob object).
  • audiolet (⭐891) - A JavaScript library for real-time audio synthesis and composition from within the browser.
  • playnote (⭐2) - Play your favorite instrument in the browser, with complex note intervals and scales.
  • Recorderjs (⭐4.2k) - A plugin for recording/exporting the output of Web Audio API nodes.
  • resampler (⭐39) - A utility for resampling audio.
  • bpm-detective (⭐144) – Detects the BPM of a song or audio sample.
  • web-audio-utils (⭐10) - Commonly needed utility functions for Web Audio API.
  • web-audio-oscillators (⭐67) - A collection of Web Audio custom oscillators.
  • midi-ports (⭐15) - handy library to make it easier to work with attached MIDI devices.
  • Midi Logger - This Midi Logger will print all midi input to your browser for debugging.
  • Code Player (⭐21) - An experimental app that makes your codes sing for you.
entry.summary: 32 awesome projects updated on Dec 09 - Dec 15, 2019

entry.content:
